channel.title: Need help with commands?
channel.description: i was having fun with mopar in 127.0.0.1 but are there more editing commands than just ::npc ::setnpc ::setobject ::setitem ::item etc...?

item.title: Need help with commands?
item.dc:creator: @3p1cpkz 3p1cpkz
item.description:
@3p1cpkz wrote:

i said i was having fun in 127.0.0.1
thats like what the server stays on after “start server”
i need commands and stuff like that to like add objects… not just npc with the ::npc command

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with commands?
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

3p1cpkz:

i was having fun with mopar in 127.0.0.1 but are there more editing commands than just ::npc ::setnpc ::setobject ::setitem ::item etc…?

Okay, you will want to get your own server and client.

There are a lot out there, choose wisely though, many of them have broken cache. Also with this concept, many clients have removed the useless “cheating” commands, some still have the ::noclip command though. The rest is all server sided.

Read full topic
